weka.classifiers.functions.gmlvq.core.cost

Class DefaultCostFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.functions.gmlvq.core.cost.AbstractCostFunction
      • weka.classifiers.functions.gmlvq.core.cost.DefaultCostFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, CostFunction, Disposable

    public class DefaultCostFunction
extends AbstractCostFunction
    The default cost function which can be employed in any case. For problems with more than 2 classes, currently the only CostFunction implementation applicable.
    Author:
    S
